dc_title_s: Statistical map of the United States of America
dc_creator_sm: United States. Department of the Treasury
dc_description_s: July 1864.; "Bowen & Co. Lith. Philada."; "The Railroads within the States already in operation are represented by continuous lines; those which are only projected, by dotted lines."|36 x 49 centimeters|Scale [ca. 1:8,000,000?]|General Map Collection
